law.catch_line: Membership required to operate warehouse or purchase tobacco therein.
law.text: Every tobacco warehouse offering tobacco for sale at auction shall be a member of its local tobacco board of trade, and membership in good standing shall be deemed to be a reasonable requirement by such tobacco board of trade as a condition precedent to participating in the business of operating a tobacco warehouse or the purchase of tobacco at auction therein.

metadata.former-history: -- Repealed 1966 Ky. Acts ch. 255, sec. 283. -- Created 1962 Ky. Acts ch. 302, sec. 3.
